page.title: 14LOCAL GOVERNMENT IN GROVE.
page.content: The Grove area is administered by the Grove Parish Council,Bassetlaw District Council and Nottinghamshire County Council.The latter is responsible for Highways,Social Services,Police and Fire and Education.The County mobile library visits the area on a fortnightly basis.Leisure activities,including swimming,are provided by the District Council at their Sports Centre in Retford,four miles away.Regular leisure activities are not organised within the village itself.Occasional Cheese and Wine Parties in aid of St.Helen's Church are held in the Garden Centre. Villagers take an interest in the annual 'Well Blessing' at nearby Headon.Locally,there are no buildings under construction,neither have any been recently completed.
